title: Update contact details: email, phone, and location in ContactCTA section

requirements.summary: Update email address to 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com' in ContactCTA component
acceptanceCriteria: The email displayed in the contact info card reads 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com'

file_operations.description: Update the email address displayed in the contact info card to 'saravana@espiritdecrops.com' and ensure the corresponding mailto: href uses the same address

requirements.summary: Update phone number to '+91 7259145275' in ContactCTA component
acceptanceCriteria: The phone number displayed in the contact info card reads '+91 7259145275'

file_operations.description: Update the phone number displayed in the contact info card to '+91 7259145275' and ensure the corresponding tel: href uses '+917259145275' (without spaces)

requirements.summary: Update location text to 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available' in ContactCTA component
acceptanceCriteria: The location displayed in the contact info card reads 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available'

file_operations.description: Update the location/address text displayed in the contact info card to 'Bangalore – All India Remote Available'
